column1: Stopped by the FWM Emergency Service in Mehoopany PA to check out their new state-of-the-art ambulance. This new addition will allow these first responders to provide more comprehensive service to their region. Thank you for you service! https://t.co/JxmlulUmxF

I'm thrilled to see the USMCA head to @realDonaldTrump  today. In the face of a partisan impeachment President Trump continues to deliver on his promises to our farmers and manufacturers.  https://t.co/EI8ltWAQZI

In case you missed it I published an Op-Ed in the Daily Item highlighting the legislative accomplishments that our office has achieved on behalf of the people of Pennsylvania’s 12th Congressional District.  Check out my my Op-Ed below  https://t.co/8C9O9723e5

Our team was out in Clinton and Susquehanna counties today for their Republican Committee meetings. We received important updates about the hard work these communities are doing to support President Trump and keep #PA12 red! https://t.co/4Cgxzw2SkD
Stopped by Dunkin Donuts in Hummels Wharf to say hello to some familiar faces before heading back to Washington. #PA12 https://t.co/4rQahf9gYj

Awesome response this week from so many friends and supporters as we kicked off our re-election campaign! An investment in our campaign today will help us support President Trump and keep PA red!  Donate here: https://t.co/Ra8GeGBEzi https://t.co/LVjSw1E50P

Our team is working hard every day for President Trump’s America First agenda taking the needs of constituents directly to Congress and never forgetting the values of those who elected me.  More from my re-election campaign announcement here:  https://t.co/xChBVjwVd1

Today I am excited to announce my re-election campaign for Congress. It has been an honor to represent #PA12 and take your wants needs and ideas directly to the halls of Congress.  To join our team or to make a contribution please visit my website: https://t.co/pux6j93A6K https://t.co/jY8ZyHhm3P
Had a blast at the 104th Pennsylvania Farm Show meeting with constituents and seeing all that our agricultural industry has to offer. #PAFarmShow https://t.co/u2yR8uUG13

Wishing everyone across #PA12 a Happy and Healthy New Year! 2019 was great — let’s make 2020 even better! It is an honor to represent you in Congress. https://t.co/LxRWAx7K6C
